CustomField.formula: IF( OR( $User.View_All_Contracts__c = TRUE, CONTAINS(Contract_Record_Type_Formula__c,'Frontier Services Agreement'), IF( OR(CONTAINS(CreatedBy.UserRole.Name, 'B2B'), CONTAINS(CreatedBy.Profile.Name, '#Revana AccountExec')), IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'B2B'), TRUE, FALSE ), IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'B2B'), FALSE, TRUE ) ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Can logged in user see this record?
